Html:
Hi all,

I have the following issue: I have situation where I hear in a SIP endpoint application a very long played beep tone in the headset where I don't know where it is coming from. Beside the possibility that it can come from the RTP stream I want also to check if anything is wrong on the client machine itself as there are also wav files played locally in some situations. The tone is played for a quite long time so it makes it really impossible to work with the application.

My question is now if it is possible to record everything I hear in an USB headset and if there is a way of identifying from where this stream is sent to the headset? Or if you have any other idea how I can identify from where this beep tone is coming.

Thank you very much, I appreciate every comment I get.

Br,
Uzay

to record everything you hear, look at WasapiLoopbackCapture.
As for telling where it came from, I'm afraid NAudio can't help you with that.
